page.title: 07A Saturday in my life
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 10 o'clock, get dressed and go down for my breakfast.Usually then I wash the pots,tidy up and call for my friends.By this time it is roughly 11.30.We walk up Sandy Lane and climb the hills and run back down again.About 12 o'clock we all go running about in the fields and at 1 o'clock we go for lunch.I usually go to the fish and chip shop on Cockington Road and buy chips and 2 scalloped potatoes.Then I go back and call for my friends and go to the Balloon Wood adventure playground.At 5 o'clock I go in for my tea,watch TV,have a bath,listen to my records and then when I get tired I go to bed.
